name: Fox Runner: The Unexplored Village
description:
Fox Runner The Unexplored Village 

Is a game that is a platformer game you play as a Fox, You go on a trip and you arrive in a unexplored village that has no one living in the village looks dead but are you really sure that you're alone there ?, You have one mission try and find clue's on how and why is there no one is in the town.

Look for clues and try and figure out how and what happened to the residents of the village.

"This is a an active story and game development so expect some change's"
